results.overview: A nanny is hired by a troubled mother and finds herself fighting to hold together the entire family when she realizes the woman has an imaginary daughter.
results.title: Invisible Child

results.overview: A little boy on vacation at the seaside meets an invisible girl who takes him to her world.
results.title: The Invisible Child

results.overview: Seven short films - each one focused on the plight of a different child protagonist.
results.title: All the Invisible Children

results.overview: Aya has lived a lonely life without an official identity because her mother is an illegal migrant worker. When Aya becomes ill, she meets two playmates in the hospital and discovers they are also Invisible Children, incapable of growing up ...
results.title: Invisible Children

results.overview: A young boy and his friends attempt to become invisible to get closer to the girls they desire. They must steal the magic recipe and its ingredients without getting caught to perform the ritual.
results.title: The Invisible Children

results.overview: Based on the Asian horror comic book Yin and Yang, this film tells the story of the Yin and Yang, which is commonly known as the world in the Republic of China. It is said that this mysterious coffin will have a horrible thing. According to the Republic of China Times, in the 34th year of the Republic of China (1945 during the Kuomintang rule), a strange child disappeared. A group of children playing hide and seek on the back hill suddenly had a mysterious disappearance. Since then, whenever a thunder is hit, there will always be a figure of a child on the roof of the temple behind the temple. The bizarre things happen one after another. It is the disappearing child revenge coming back for revenge, or the legendary Is yin and yang blaming?
results.title: Untold Body

results.overview: A brash, irreverent and poetically playful collage of stories about people in Singapore who run away and disappear forever. Two children run away from home and discover an ancient underground network of monsoon drains, tunnels and caves. An army officer obsessed with order and discipline realises that life isnít so black and white. A painfully shy man reluctantly saves his neighbour and experiences a spiritual awakening.  Concocted from a heady mix of realism and poetic fantasy, Invisible Children is sometimes funny, sometimes poignant, but always thought-provoking.
results.title: Invisible Children

results.overview: In the spring of 2003, three young filmmakers traveled to Africa in search of a story. What started out as a filmmaking adventure transformed into much more when these boys from Southern California discovered a tragedy that disgusted and inspired them, a tragedy where children are both the weapons and the victims. After returning to the States, they created the documentary "Invisible Children: Rough Cut," a film that exposes the tragic realities of northern Uganda.s night commuters and child soldiers. The film was originally shown to friends and family, but has now been seen by millions of people. The overwhelming response has been, "How can I help?" To answer this question, the non-profit Invisible Children, Inc. was created, giving compassionate individuals an effective way to respond to the situation.
results.title: Invisible Children
